a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of countries that approve of nuclear weapons treaties

Countries that
approve
of the
Partial Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty
, the
Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty
, the

Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty
, and the
Nuclear Prohibition Treaty
.
Data source: United Nations Office for Disarmament Affairs (2025)
